variable.name: acage
variable.description: Present age of patient

variable.name: acb5prob
variable.description: Describe problem with fingers - NOTE: 1=the Paper data collection form provided space for text describing problem; fields in the computer record, however, show only code of "1" or are blank. DCC recommends that this field be ignored.

variable.name: acb6prob
variable.description: Describe problem with wrist - NOTE: 1=the Paper data collection form provided space for text describing problem; fields in the computer record, however, show only code of "1" or are blank. DCC recommends that this field be ignored.

variable.name: acbeer
variable.description: Patient has had beer in past 48 hours

variable.name: acbgacpt
variable.description: Blood glucose levels were acceptable for neurobehavioral test

variable.name: acbgchkd
variable.description: Blood glucose levels were checked at appropriate time during session

variable.name: accansee
variable.description: Patient has lenses/eye glasses with you

variable.name: accolleg
variable.description: Years in college

variable.name: accomplt
variable.description: Number of years of school completed

variable.name: acelesec
variable.description: Grade/year in elementary or secondary school

variable.name: acenglis
variable.description: English is native language

variable.name: aceyegla
variable.description: Patient wears glasses or contact lenses

variable.name: acfinger
variable.description: Patient has problems now using any fingers

variable.name: acged
variable.description: Patient received a G. E. D.

variable.name: acgradsc
variable.description: Year in graduate school

variable.name: achanded
variable.description: Patient's writing hand

variable.name: achardrk
variable.description: Patient has had hard liquor in past 48 hours

variable.name: achearok
variable.description: Patient has hearing problems

variable.name: aclefti
variable.description: Problems with: index finger on left hand

variable.name: acleftl
variable.description: Problems with: little finger on left hand

variable.name: acleftm
variable.description: Problems with: middle finger on left hand

variable.name: acleftr
variable.description: Problems with: ring finger on left hand

variable.name: acleftt
variable.description: Problems with: thumb on left hand

variable.name: aclernen
variable.description: Age at which patient learned English

variable.name: acmedici
variable.description: Patient has taken medications/drugs in past 48 hours

variable.name: acrighti
variable.description: Problems with: index finger on right hand

variable.name: acrightl
variable.description: Problems with: little finger on right hand

variable.name: acrightm
variable.description: Problems with: middle finger on right hand

variable.name: acrightr
variable.description: Problems with: ring finger on right hand

variable.name: acrightt
variable.description: Problems with: thumb on right hand

variable.name: acschool
variable.description: Patient is in school now

variable.name: acvsitno
variable.description: Follow-up visit number

variable.name: acwine
variable.description: Patient has had wine in past 48 hours

variable.name: acwrist
variable.description: Patient can move both wrists freely

variable.name: acwristt
variable.description: Wrist (right/left/both) is difficult to move freely

variable.name: form
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: Patient ID number
